table.name: Reference_Item
table.description: This table is basically used for creating parent/child relationships for Enumeration and Lookup tables. Since it has no columns, no physical table will exist so it becomes a simple logical placeholder.

column.name: id
column.descr: The value associated with a single enum

column.name: caption
column.descr: The name/text an end-user would see

column.name: abbrev
column.descr: An abbreviated form of the caption

column.name: group_name
column.descr: The group to which the lookup item belongs

column.name: sort_seq
column.descr: The sorting sequence within the group (if sorting differently than the ID or Caption

column.name: result
column.descr: The type of result after a lookup (the value that should be used for the lookup -- the id or caption or abbreviation)
